body:
Syntax: cast 'bless' <target>

Bless enhances the target's combat abilities, providing a +1 bonus to hit
rolls and saving throws. This blessing from the gods improves your chances
in both physical combat and magical resistance.

Classes: Cleric, Paladin
Level: 5 (Cleric), 8 (Paladin)
Mana Cost: 5
Duration: 6 hours
Position: Standing or Fighting

Bless can be cast on yourself, others, or even on weapons to make them more
effective in combat. It is a fundamental enhancement spell.

See Also: ARMOR, GROUP BLESS
